CustomField.description: Based on the number of Lawyers, what is the license band for this account?
CustomField.formula: IF( Lawyers__c <= 50, 50, IF( Lawyers__c <= 500, MCEILING(Lawyers__c/25) * 25, MCEILING(Lawyers__c/50) * 50 ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Based on the number of lawyers, what is the license band for this account?
CustomField.label: License Band (Lawyers / Professionals)
